net.explorviz.security.server.resources

Class TokenResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.explorviz.security.server.resources.TokenResource

  • @Path(value="v1/tokens")
public class TokenResource
extends java.lang.Object
    The token resource class provides endpoints for token obtainment and refreshment.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TokenResource() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      User issueToken(UserCredentials credentials)
      This method issues a Json Web Token (JWT) for passed user credentials.
      Token refresh(javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestContext context)
      This method refreshes a Json Web Token (JWT).

    • Constructor Detail

      • TokenResource

        public TokenResource()

    • Method Detail

      • issueToken

        @POST
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.api+json")
 @PermitAll
public User issueToken(UserCredentials credentials)
        This method issues a Json Web Token (JWT) for passed user credentials. The token expires after 1 hour and can be refreshed once. After that, users must issue a new token.
        Parameters:
        credentials - - Username and password for authentication
        Returns:
        JWT that contains user information

      • refresh

        @POST
 @Path(value="refresh")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public Token refresh(@Context
                                                                                        javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestContext context)
        This method refreshes a Json Web Token (JWT). The HTTP POST body must not contain data and the to-be refreshed token inside of the ' Authorization: Bearer' header.
        Parameters:
        context - - the context of the container
        Returns:
        Refreshed JWT with an incremented refresh counter.
